name: §6§lBreaking the Seal§r
description:
§r§7The ultimate ritual to escape your dimensional prison. Gather all four upgrades, then construct the liberation altar in the overworld:§r

§e§lStructure (place on respawn anchor):§r
§8- §7Center: §fRespawn Anchor§r
§8- §7Adjacent (4 sides): §5Crying Obsidian§r
§8- §7Corners: §8Deepslate§r
§8- §7Outer (4 sides): §3Lodestone§r

§6Stand on the respawn anchor while astral and press saveToolbarActivator to complete the ritual.§r

§d§lYour consciousness will be freed from its cage, allowing you to exist as a new being.§r

badges.text: §6Build the liberation altar and press saveToolbarActivator while astral with all upgrades§r
§7Required: Anchor, Mark, Movement, and Regeneration upgrades§r
